title: Welcome to the EBRAINS Metadata Wizard!

welcomeText.text:
Thank you for choosing EBRAINS to share your research data. This form helps you describe key aspects of your dataset so that other researchers will be able to find, reuse and cite your work. We collect information in the following categories:

  • Data owner and contributors
  • Experimental methods and subjects
  • Licensing, embargo and funding
  • Related publications

While filling out the form, please remember to consider all data related to the dataset that you wish to publish on EBRAINS. Once you complete the form, metadata describing your dataset will be organized according to the openMINDS standard (open Metadata Initiative for Neuroscience Data Structures).

The focus of the EBRAINS Metadata Wizard is to collect the most fundamental information about your research data in a concise way (Common Curation Track). Of course we are happy to record more detailed information about any aspect of your dataset. Please contact your curator for more information (Advanced Curation Track).

ticketNumber.title: Ticket number
ticketNumber.description: Please enter the ticket number that you received from your curator, e.g Ticket#4815613.

contactperson.title: Contact person
contactperson.description: The contact person is the individual the curation team will interact with for gathering the information needed for the curation of your dataset.
